name: The Lonly
description:
Use your masterful Kew body to dash, stick, and jump your way up the Incredible Lonly wall! 

Ages ago the Yellow Trinity Built the Lonly Wall, no Kew you know of has ever climbed it and returned.

This game is difficult, but rewarding, the controls are tight and it requires precise platforming to get anywhere. 

Dev Note: there are typos galore, but I got rid of every bug i could find, also if you examine nothing it gives back default text. whoops. T_T
